ODER_S_NO oderSno, ODER_S_NUM oderSnum, ORER_S_CHAR oderSchar, RT_RV_NO rtRvNo, USER_ID userId, RT_MENU_NO rtMenuNo
mapper.insert: merge into order_statement o using(select rt_menu_no, rt_menu_char from restaurant_menu where rt_menu_no = #{rtMenuNo}) r on(o.rt_menu_no = r.rt_menu_no) when matched then update set ODER_S_NUM = ODER_S_NUM + 1, ORER_S_CHAR = ORER_S_CHAR + rt_menu_char when not MATCHED then insert(ODER_S_NO, ODER_S_NUM, ORER_S_CHAR, RT_RV_NO, USER_ID, RT_MENU_NO) values(board_seq.nextval , 1, rt_menu_char, #{rtRvNo}, #{userId}, #{rtMenuNo})
